name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior Backend Engineer with 13+ years of experience specializing in **Node.js**, **TypeScript**, and **Python**. Proficient in designing and implementing **microservices**, **APIs**, and **distributed systems** that maximize performance and observability. Hands-on expertise in developing **gRPC** and **REST** services, along with experience in integration with **Kafka** and **PostgreSQL**. 
Dedicated to building scalable and efficient backend architectures with a strong focus on serverless solutions and performance optimization. Effective in technical communication and mentoring team members to elevate project outcomes. Proven track record in delivering high-performance applications across the healthcare and financial sectors with attention to compliance-driven development standards.

experience.responsibilities:
Utilized **Node.js** and **TypeScript** to architect and develop high-performance backend systems, ensuring efficient handling of **APIs** and seamless **microservices** integrations.
Implemented **gRPC** and **REST** protocols to facilitate smooth communication between distributed systems, enhancing overall system performance and observability.
Engineered data solutions with **PostgreSQL**, enabling robust database management and real-time analytics to support decision-making processes.
Designed and maintained scalable **serverless** architectures utilizing cloud services, streamlining operational workflows and reducing costs by up to **30%**.
Led mentorship initiatives for junior engineers, fostering growth in technical communication and collaborative problem-solving skills across the team.
Collaborated on developing and deploying distributed systems with a focus on system reliability and performance, achieving uptime metrics of over **99.9%**.
Introduced observability tools and strategies to monitor system health and performance, resulting in improved incident response times by **40%**.
Participated in code reviews and provided constructive feedback to maintain high-quality code standards, improving delivery speed of new features by **25%**.
Contributed to the integration of **Kafka** to enhance data streaming capabilities and support real-time processing needs across multiple applications.
Developed and maintained best practices in API design and server architecture, ensuring scalability and maintainability in system operations.

• Designed and implemented **microservices architecture** leveraging **Node.js** (NestJS/Express) and **Python** (FastAPI, Django), targeting performance enhancements for high-volume transactional systems, improving scalability by **50%**.
• Developed and optimized **REST** and **gRPC** APIs to facilitate seamless communication between microservices, ensuring performance metrics improved by **30%**.
• Established a robust **Kafka** and **RabbitMQ**-based event-driven architecture, allowing for efficient asynchronous communication across critical workflows, which reduced processing times by **40%**.
• Enhanced backend performance monitoring through observability practices, employing tools that provided insights into system behavior and potential bottlenecks.
• Championed technical communication and mentorship within the team, fostering development skills and knowledge sharing that led to a **25%** improvement in team productivity.
• Collaborated in the design and deployment of ETL pipelines utilizing **Python**, **Apache Airflow**, and **Azure Data Factory**, successfully processing **500k+** records daily from various sources.
• Developed and fine-tuned machine learning models for fraud detection using **scikit-learn** and **XGBoost**, achieving detection accuracy rates of over **95%** based on observed transaction patterns.
• Integrated ML pipelines for credit scoring and churn prediction into backend services using **MLflow** and **Airflow**, enhancing decision-making processes and reducing churn by **15%**.

Designed and optimized scalable backend services for a global e-commerce platform using **Node.js (NestJS, Express)** and **Python (FastAPI, Django)**, ensuring high availability, low latency, and performance across key modules like checkout and order fulfillment.
Implemented efficient APIs using **gRPC** and **REST**, enhancing communication between distributed systems and microservices, contributing to a **30%** reduction in response times.
Engineered real-time features with **Kafka** for event-driven architecture, enabling responsive order updates and dynamic inventory tracking, improving customer satisfaction metrics by **25%**.
Leveraged **PostgreSQL**, implementing optimized queries and indexing strategies for fast, fault-tolerant data access across high-traffic e-commerce workflows.
Developed and maintained a serverless architecture, optimizing costs and scaling automatically with demand surges, leading to a **40%** increase in system efficiency during peak traffic.
Applied observability principles using monitoring tools, ensuring detailed tracking of performance, and addressing bottlenecks swiftly, resulting in a **15%** decrease in downtime incidents.
Communicated technical concepts effectively while mentoring junior team members, fostering a collaborative environment that improved team productivity.
Integrated AI/ML features for recommendation engines using Python libraries, contributing to a **10%** boost in conversion rates through personalized user experiences.
Implemented feature flags and microservice deployments using **Kubernetes**, controlling workflows and allowing A/B testing for more robust deployment strategies.
Ensured GDPR compliance and user data protection through role-based access control (RBAC) and **OAuth 2.0**, enhancing security measures for customer and admin access.
